pages.title: Batteries
pages.text: Once you start generating power, you can use the batteries to store it. Batteries come in different sizes, each with different capacity and transfer rates. All batteries can be modified via the config file to change their capacity and transfer rate.
The small battery is the first of it's kind with a small capacity and transfer rate.
The medium battery is the second of it's kind with a medium capacity and transfer rate.
The large battery is the third of it's kind with a large capacity and transfer rate.
